about_the_game:
Over an hour of adventure fueled music for your ears!
The original soundtrack for Treasure Adventure World includes 39 tracks in both MP3 and FLAC formats.

Music by Robert Ellis & Craig Barnes
Cover by Christine Crossley

Also includes a digital Instruction Booklet modeled after the classic NES booklets with 25 pages of original art by Christine Crossley

Track list:
1. Old Friends (New Beginnings) 02:32
2. Born For Adventure 02:28
3. Cave Crawling 02:22
4. 8-Bit Insomnia 02:02

11. Fight Or Fight 02:37
12. Core Temperature 01:16
13. All Hands On Deck 01:30
14. Open Waters 02:04
15. Ten Thousand 03:22
16. Miles to Go 01:55
17. Forgiving The Plow 01:39
18. City Living 02:18
19. Tomba Heights 01:34
20. Electric Dolphin Funk 02:21
21. Duct Work 01:54
22. Duct Work Electrified 01:54
23. Vine to Vine 02:10
24. Sleepless Stridulation 01:28
25. Among Friends 00:30
26. Haunted 02:12
27. Soul Seeker 03:16
28. Endless Theater 02:56
29. Crystal Kick 01:47
